summary: A famous int'l conductor returns to his small childhood town in northern Sweden for early retirement. He's asked to help with the church choir. He affects the lives of all in the choir.
cast: Michael Nyqvist|Frida Hallgren|Helen Sjöholm|Lennart Jähkel|Ingela Olsson|Niklas Falk|Per Morberg|Ylva Lööf|André Sjöberg|Mikael Rahm|Barbro Kollberg|Axelle Axell|Lasse Pettersson|Ulla-Britt Norrman-Olsson|Nils-Anders Vallgårda|Lotten Vallgårda|Mircea Crisan|Kristina Törnqvist|Johannes Schantz|Anna Lundström|Verena Buratti|Alexandra Hummingson
title: Tierra de ángeles
